page.title: 12MEDIA IN THE AREA
page.content: Children at Swinnerton School were questioned for this part of the survey. NEWSPAPERS:The Sun is by far the most popular newspaper folowed by The Mirror and The Star.There are two local papers;The Tribune and The Evening Telegraph.There are two free papers; The Observer and The Trader. TELEVISION:115 surveyed have a colour set,42 just a black/white set,219 with both and 4 with no T.V. RADIO:Mercia Sound (Commercial Radio Station) is by far the most popular station listened to followed by Radio 1.We like to listen to Sports programmes the top 10 pop records, phone ins and quiz programmes. VIDEOS:About one half of those surveyed have a video recorder. There are two shops in the area which sell videos and hire out tapes.
